String.string: Fragment of Hope
"All right."
You must save the blacksmith!
Striktryssir's Horn
Obtain {@LinkCreature:38#45#Striktryssir}'s Horn at Barbtail Coulee in the Sienna Canyon. (Use the teleportal to get to the next town and use another teleportal there.)
Bring Striktryssir's Horn to {@LinkCreature:238#1100#Torsten}, near the pyramid at Thunder Hold.
Go to the top of the pyramid.
The relic fragment grants you its power!
Go to the top of the pyramid on the right at Thunder Hold, then absorb the relic fragment's power.
Grigelt's Wrath
Hunt {@LinkCreature:35#1000#Grigelt} in the Deathgorge and gather the essence of his wrath. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received and use a teleportal in the town.)
Bring Grigelt's wrath to Torsten, near the altar in Deathgorge.
Go to the top of the altar.
Behold the relic fragment's power!
Go to Deathgorge and bring the relic fragment to the altar to release its power.
"Right. Okay."
Go back to the altar and speak with Torsten again.
"I'm ready! Do it!"
Go to Torsten, near the teleportal in Blood Valley.
Jester's Villa
You sense the presence of Killian, God of Terror, nearby...
Use the {@LinkCreature:236#1006#teleportal} to go to the Jester's Villa.
Eliminate Killian's pet, Snaharzim.

Go back to Commander Fraya in the Allemantheia Headquarters and tell her you have three of the four relic fragments. (You can use the teleportal to travel to Checkpoint Ebony and buy teleport scrolls from the merchant.)
"I'll find the blacksmith."
Go back to Kaiator Headquarters and tell Goddess Kaia that you have three relic fragments. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
"Thank you."
Go to Tamur at Kaiator Command Center and receive information of the legendary blacksmith.
